Comments_List: I developed a much more nuanced understanding of Ancient Greek politics, especially the development of Ancient Athenian democracy

The only weakness I could identify would be to spend a more time getting really into the readings. However, I understand that the class was for graduate students and undergrads, and there were substantially more undergrads. This class benefited--and here is the strength I'll identify--by having a wide range of materials.
Yes, I absolutely would! I don't think classes like this exist anywhere else, in spite of how important the material covered is.
